name: Tubed
description:
Epilepsy warning, do not play when you weak!

This game done in Common Lisp language for August 2016 Lisp Game Jam

Game
Your goal is to collect maximum parenthesis in minimum amount of time.

Comments about Lisp
As a painter draws a line and experimenting on fly with it by strongly connected with his work. With lisp i feel the same. So, how can i paint when my eyes covered, and i can see only by doing step back..

Running

On Windows

Run TUBED-Win32.exe

On Linux

Before run TUBED-Linux check that you dependencies ready
To install dependencies on Ubuntu (and Debian family):
sudo apt-get install libffi6 libsdl2 libsdl2-image libsdl2-ttf libsdl2-mixer
To install dependencies on Fedora:
sudo dnf install libffi SDL2 SDL2_image SDL2_ttf SDL2_mixer

Tools
Graphics - Krita
Music and sounds - SunVox

Sources
You can find source-files on GitHub
